TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit UrlAttribute extends System.Runtime.Remoting.Contexts.ContextAttribute
Public NotInheritable Class UrlAttribute Inherits ContextAttribute

Docs.summary: Defines an attribute that can be used at the call site to specify the URL where the activation will happen. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.UrlAttribute> is passed in the activation attributes array as a parameter to <xref:System.Activator.CreateInstance%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> when creating activated objects with the <xref:System.Activator.CreateInstance%2A> method.
For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md).
## Examples The following code example illustrates the use of the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.UrlAttribute> in setting up client-activated remoting. The example contains three parts: a client, a server, and a remote object that is used by the client and server.
The following code example shows a client:
[!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.UrlAttribute#0](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.UrlAttribute/CPP/client.cpp#0)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.UrlAttribute#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.UrlAttribute/CS/client.cs#0)]
The following code example shows a server for this client:
[!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.UrlAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.UrlAttribute/CPP/server.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.UrlAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.UrlAttribute/CS/server.cs#2)]
The following code example shows the remote object that is used by the client and the server:
[!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.UrlAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.UrlAttribute/CPP/remoteobject.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.UrlAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.UrlAttribute/CS/remoteobject.cs#3)]

Docs.param: The of the server object to create.
Docs.summary: Forces the creation of the context and the server object inside the context at the specified URL.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.UrlAttribute.GetPropertiesForNewContext%2A> does not contribute any properties to the new context because it is used by the remoting infrastructure to force the creation of the context and the server object inside the context at the specified URL.
